skills.name: Royal Air Force (ロイヤルエアフォース)
skills.text:
1. Crit Rate increased by 20%.
2. If an [Airstrike] hits, for every Bomber Squadron that Ark Royal has equipped, there is a 100% chance to reduce enemy fleet's Speed by 50% and disables their rudders, lasts 20 seconds. Does not stack.

skills.name: Hawkeye (ホークアイ)
skills.text: 1. If an [Airstrike] hits, for every Bomber Squadron that Ark Royal has equipped, there is a 70% chance to increase the target's received damage by 5%, that lasts 30 seconds and can stack. Works with [Pre-emptive Airstrike].
